Neural Networks: Biological vs. Artificial (Intro)

Aug 3, 2019

I got curious about the simplifications and abstractions that we collectively inflicted on neurological models of the brain in order to arrive at what we today call “neural networks”. I ordered & am reading a textbook called Principles of Neurobiology, by Liqun Luo. Below please find chapter-grouped blog posts with the facts that I found most surprising and divergent from how artificial neural networks work.

Pt. 1
